name: Center
description:
Fast-paced arcade shooter that's sure to get your blood pumping.

Use your trusty bi-color pellet gun to prevent any shapes from reaching you at the center of the screen - or it's game over.

Made with ♥ and Processing.org + sfxr. Rather unfinished currently. Made for Ludum Dare 34! http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=20285
